description.value: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unblinking Flame Revelation] for Unblinking Flame, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unbreaking Wave Advance] for Unbreaking Waves, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfolding Wind Rush] for Unfolding Wind, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Untwisting Iron Buffer] for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
